%%pyspark
df = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/applications.csv', format='csv'
## If header exists uncomment line below
, header=True
)
display(df.limit(10))
df.count()

%%pyspark
#loading CohortTableList.parquet to dataframe
ctl_tbl = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/CohortTableList.parquet', format='parquet')
##dg = dg.drop('Title')

display(ctl_tbl.limit(10))
ctl_tbl.count()

%%pyspark
#loading CohortTableList.parquet to dataframe
cfrm_tbl = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/CohortForm.parquet', format='parquet')
##dg = dg.drop('Title')

display(cfrm_tbl.limit(10))
cfrm_tbl.count()

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

df = df.withColumn("Job",lower(translate(col("Job"),"./–!-() ","")))
ctl_tbl = ctl_tbl.withColumn("JobDescription",lower(translate(col("JobDescription"),"./–!-() ","")))
display(df.limit(5))
display(ctl_tbl.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.types import *

cfrm_tbl = cfrm_tbl.select("Id","Title")
join_cfctl=ctl_tbl.join(cfrm_tbl,ctl_tbl.CohortNameId == cfrm_tbl.Id,"left").drop_duplicates()

ctl_tbl = ctl_tbl.select("AcctMngrID", "JobDescription")
join_dfctl=df.join(ctl_tbl,df.Job == ctl_tbl.JobDescription,"left").drop_duplicates()

display(join_dfctl.limit(5))
join_dfctl.count()

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

join_dfctl= join_dfctl.withColumn("Year", year(to_date(join_dfctl.AppliedOrSourcedDate,"M/d/y"))) \
       .withColumn("Week", weekofyear(to_date(join_dfctl.AppliedOrSourcedDate, "M/d/y"))) \
.withColumn("TrackerType", when((join_dfctl.Stage == "Sourced") | (join_dfctl.Stage == "Applied") , "Reach")
.when((join_dfctl.Stage == "Screen") | (join_dfctl.Stage == "Assessment"), "Test") 
.when((join_dfctl.Stage == "Interview"), "Interview") \
.when((join_dfctl.Stage == "Shortlisted") | (join_dfctl.Stage == "Offer"), "Offer") 
.when((join_dfctl.Stage == "Hired"), "Conversion") 
.otherwise(""))
display(join_dfctl.limit(5))
join_dfctl.count()

%%pyspark
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.types import *

TrackTbl=join_dfctl.select("TrackerType")
TrackTbl=TrackTbl.groupBy("TrackerType").agg(count("TrackerType")).show()
